name: DiscoCruiser
description:
Cruise through the highways, listening to some beats...while a massive tsunami chases you.

Whatever you do...DO NOT LOOK BEHIND YOU.

Controls:

Hold E: Look behind you lol

W: Accelerate

Space: Brake

A, D: Turn

Holding space while turning makes you drift babyyy

Music: Modjo - Lady

Credits:
